name: Robotics Training
description:
This is a quick game to help us train for the regionals.

Forgot to mention in the game:

-Movement with the right joystick;

-Rotation with the Dpad/Left Joystick

-Shooting with A/X button

!Also, the blue line represents the front of the robot!

Attention:THIS IS JUST PROTOTYPE BUILDT IN A FEW HOURS!Bugs are expected.
